topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53c8400c636872132fa00400#post_53c8400c636872132fa00400
If I got to choose who to reincarnate to I would want a troll reincarnation and be the sole child of a evil dictator.

"Now listen; this is why committing genocide is good for the country?"
Me, "Why?  What purpose does it serve?  Won't that just piss people off and make them want to kill you?"
"No!  When they revolt you kill them!"
"Wouldn't it be better to support freedom of speech, freedom of religion, increase the people's rights, give them a living wage, free education and free health care so that they're more likely to not revolt?"
"No!  That won't work!"
"*Holds up peer reviewed studies into the standard of living and personal freedoms vs national stability*  The facts seem to say otherwise"
"(incoherent anger) Anything that disagrees with me is wrong and incorrect!  What's next?  Giving rights to gays?"
"Why not?"
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
